item.description:
SEASONAL MENU
$19.95 PER PERSON
Sunday – Wednesday
make it for two,
with a bottle of
BERINGER WINE
for $49.95
See website for menu: www.watermangrille.com

Nice place to meet and mingle.
lets all get together and have a chance to meet and talk about future events this group would like to set up?
who wants to be assistant organizers/how we can all be part of this site and make it work for all involved.Comfort food, at a Comfortable Price

I have made reservations for 10 with open option to have bill being a separate bills for all, so we dont have to figuere it all out. I asked for seats near the water which could not be sure to get granted but they would do there best to make the area close to a water view.

Below is the list of entree's appts, and dessert all included for 19.95, the place is beautiful and classy. Looking forward to meeting all who will attend and getting ideas and suggestions of what things we can do to make this site fun for all. Please bring suggestions with you on peice of paper and we can discuss the ideas as we pull them out to discuss. No one will know who suggested the event or idea unless you want it to be recognized as your own idea and would like to be the host of the event. I would like to make this site a group effort and looking to eveyone to have it all happen. Big things do happen in numbers.
This will be our first meetup of the year and I am hoping that all who answered yes to coming will be good enough to show up. If you cannot make this event please RSVP by the 12th so i can change the number of attendees at the Waterman Grille.

Bar items will also be at your own expense!

Now i know a big football game will be underway, but im sure we can get the score and who knows a occasional view what the happening at the bar.


Entrée
Waterman Steak; Hereford top sirloin,
chedder, bacon, scallion mashed, crispy
onion strings, red chile-bourbon aïoli

Murray’s Statler Chicken Breast;
white bean, tomato, fennel ragout;
escarole, grilled bread

Cod Aqua Pazzo; mussels, cherry tomato,
chourico, Israeli cous cous; grilled fennel,
toasted crostini

Cedar-Planked Salmon; wood roasted
salmon, root vegetable hash; sautéed
spinach, coriander spiced crème fraîche

First Course
Squash Soup
chive sour cream

Waterman Salad
baby greens, grape tomato,
English cucumber, red onion,
gorgonzola, crostini, roasted
garlic-balsamic vinaigrette

Szechuan Beef Skewers
wood-grilled beef skewers,
fiery peanut dip

Dessert
Chocolate Mousse Torte
raspberry coulis, whipped cream

Crème Brûlée
caramelized sugar top,

fresh mint
Seasonal Fruit Sorbet
or Ice Cream

group.name: Mingle with singles 45+ Socializing and dancing

item.name: Dinner out Waterman Grille
